## ChromeStart.navControls property

[APIs](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavcontrols.md) for registering new controls to be displayed in the navigation bar.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
navControls: ChromeNavControls;
```
